title: SOLD 1895 Mayo N300 Dan Brouthers Low Grade
author: piecesofthegame

posts.post_title: SOLD 1895 Mayo N300 Dan Brouthers Low Grade
posts.post_content:
Pretty low grade Mayo Brouthers . Looks to be touched up in spots at some point in the distant past as is so common on these...thus the low price. It will grade authentic but nothing more. Nice way to get a 19th century HOFer cheap.SOLD
